an6.56:1.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma phagguno abadhiko hoti dukkhito balhagilano.
an6.56:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.56:1.4: Sadhu, bhante, bhagava yenayasma phagguno tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an6.56:1.6: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma phagguno tenupasankami.
an6.56:1.7: Addasa kho ayasma phagguno bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
an6.56:1.9: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam phaggunam etadavoca:
an6.56:1.11: Santimani asanani parehi pannattani, tatthaham nisidissami”ti.
an6.56:1.13: Nisajja kho bhagava ayasmantam phaggunam etadavoca:
an6.56:2.1: “Kacci te, phagguna, khamaniyam kacci yapaniyam? Kacci te dukkha vedana patikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; patikkamosanam pannayati, no abhikkamo”ti?
an6.56:2.2: “Na me, bhante, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo.
an6.56:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, balava puriso tinhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evamevam kho me, bhante, adhimatta vata muddhani uhananti.
an6.56:3.2: Na me, bhante, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo.
an6.56:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, balava puriso dalhena varattakkhandena sisavethanam dadeyya; evamevam kho me, bhante, adhimatta sise sisavedana.
an6.56:4.2: Na me, bhante, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo.
an6.56:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, dakkho goghatako va goghatakantevasi va tinhena govikantanena kucchim parikanteyya; evamevam kho me, bhante, adhimatta vata kucchim parikantanti.
an6.56:5.2: Na me, bhante, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo.
an6.56:6.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, dve balavanto purisa dubbalataram purisam nanabahasu gahetva angarakasuya santapeyyum samparitapeyyum; evamevam kho me, bhante, adhimatto kayasmim daho.
an6.56:6.2: Na me, bhante, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo”ti.
an6.56:6.3: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam phaggunam dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva utthayasana pakkami.
an6.56:7.1: Atha kho ayasma phagguno acirapakkantassa bhagavato kalamakasi.
an6.56:7.2: Tamhi cassa samaye maranakale indriyani vippasidimsu.
an6.56:7.3: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.56:7.5: Tamhi cassa samaye maranakale indriyani vippasidimsu”ti.
an6.56:8.1: “Kim hananda, phaggunassa bhikkhuno indriyani na vippasidissanti.
an6.56:8.2: Phaggunassa, ananda, bhikkhuno pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam avimuttam ahosi.
an6.56:8.3: Tassa tam dhammadesanam sutva pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam vimuttam.
an6.56:9.1: Chayime, ananda, anisamsa kalena dhammassavane kalena atthupaparikkhaya.
an6.56:9.3: Idhananda, bhikkhuno pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam avimuttam hoti.
an6.56:9.4: So tamhi samaye maranakale labhati tathagatam dassanaya.
an6.56:9.5: Tassa tathagato dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
an6.56:9.6: Tassa tam dhammadesanam sutva pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam vimuccati.
an6.56:9.7: Ayam, ananda, pathamo anisamso kalena dhammassavane.
an6.56:10.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam avimuttam hoti.
an6.56:10.2: So tamhi samaye maranakale na heva kho labhati tathagatam dassanaya, api ca kho tathagatasavakam labhati dassanaya.
an6.56:10.3: Tassa tathagatasavako dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
an6.56:10.4: Tassa tam dhammadesanam sutva pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam vimuccati.
an6.56:10.5: Ayam, ananda, dutiyo anisamso kalena dhammassavane.
an6.56:11.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam avimuttam hoti.
an6.56:11.2: So tamhi samaye maranakale na heva kho labhati tathagatam dassanaya, napi tathagatasavakam labhati dassanaya;
an6.56:11.3: api ca kho yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam cetasa anuvitakketi anuvicareti manasanupekkhati.
an6.56:11.4: Tassa yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam cetasa anuvitakkayato anuvicarayato manasanupekkhato pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam vimuccati.
an6.56:11.5: Ayam, ananda, tatiyo anisamso kalena atthupaparikkhaya.
an6.56:12.1: Idhananda, bhikkhuno pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam vimuttam hoti, anuttare ca kho upadhisankhaye cittam avimuttam hoti.
an6.56:12.2: So tamhi samaye maranakale labhati tathagatam dassanaya.
an6.56:12.3: Tassa tathagato dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam …pe… brahmacariyam pakaseti.
an6.56:12.4: Tassa tam dhammadesanam sutva anuttare upadhisankhaye cittam vimuccati.
an6.56:12.5: Ayam, ananda, catuttho anisamso kalena dhammassavane.
an6.56:13.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam vimuttam hoti, anuttare ca kho upadhisankhaye cittam avimuttam hoti.
an6.56:13.2: So tamhi samaye maranakale na heva kho labhati tathagatam dassanaya, api ca kho tathagatasavakam labhati dassanaya.
an6.56:13.3: Tassa tathagatasavako dhammam deseti adikalyanam …pe… parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
an6.56:13.4: Tassa tam dhammadesanam sutva anuttare upadhisankhaye cittam vimuccati.
an6.56:13.5: Ayam, ananda, pancamo anisamso kalena dhammassavane.
an6.56:14.1: Puna caparam, ananda, bhikkhuno pancahi orambhagiyehi samyojanehi cittam vimuttam hoti, anuttare ca kho upadhisankhaye cittam avimuttam hoti.
an6.56:14.2: So tamhi samaye maranakale na heva kho labhati tathagatam dassanaya, napi tathagatasavakam labhati dassanaya;
an6.56:14.3: api ca kho yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam cetasa anuvitakketi anuvicareti manasanupekkhati.
an6.56:14.4: Tassa yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam cetasa anuvitakkayato anuvicarayato manasanupekkhato anuttare upadhisankhaye cittam vimuccati.
an6.56:14.5: Ayam, ananda, chattho anisamso kalena atthupaparikkhaya.
an6.56:15.1: Ime kho, ananda, cha anisamsa kalena dhammassavane kalena atthupaparikkhaya”ti.
